promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical lynx fire-type pokemon wearing dark gemstones. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyroxyst, a a gigantic mythical lynx fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Strong Flare, Make the Assist. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "fire" or "Pyroxyst". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, lynx-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Majestic and mighty, Pyroxyst thrives in arid realms, its radiant aura leaving scorching trails. Using Strong Flare and Make the Assist, it lights the path for lost wanderers.
